aboutMe.HTMLDescription:
I started programming at the age of 15, before going to university. Currently, I provide solutions for corporate banking developing backend integration workflows using IBM and ORACLE tools.

Some of my most challenging projects include credit card tokenization and the implementation of the Bre-B interbank transfer model.

As additional activities I like instruments and music, I am currently studying to get a C1 English certificationat American School Way. My goal is to find a place where I can strengthen my English communication in the business field.
